{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-AC1900P.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-AC1900 Dual-Band Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1900P/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC1900 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = P |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTACHC00 |icid = 3568A-RTACHC00CAN |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = WG9117GAC33 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex A9 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML02G200TFI00; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15F2G16128A-BDB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D0:17:C2, 34:97:F6 |oui = D0:17:C2, 34:97:F6
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;brcmarm;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MIMO, ASUS Router App, AiCloud support |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amp Module;Richwave;RTC6649E;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amp Module;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5003L1;;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS 5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9117G |manuf_rev = AC33-ASU |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Asuswrt-Merlin, FreshTomato
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/02/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 200 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07JNK1KFW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTACHC00 MSQ-RTACHC00] (2016-08-02) [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3083312 FCC Doc]
*Powerful 1.4 GHz dual-core processor for fast and responsive :performance with Wi-Fi, Ethernet and USB devices *Concurrent dual-band data rates of 1900Mbps for three times :faster performance than 802.11n routers *Broadcom nqam technology increases wireless-N data rate :to 600Mbps for 33% faster performance *3x Smart high-performance dual band Wi-Fi detachable 5dBi antenna *5x Gigabit Ethernet ports for fast, stable wired network connections *2x USB ports with USB 3.0 for faster data transfer than USB 2.0 *ASUS AiCloud cloud service to access, sync, share, and stream :your data wherever you are, even connect to other compatible :routers creating a private cloud server with family and friends *This model is sold exclusively at Best Buy
===Features=== *Airtime Fairness, Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control *Dual WAN, IPTV support, Roaming Assist, Guest Network (3x) *VPN server: IPSec Pass-Through, PPTP Pass-Through, :L2TP Pass-Through, PPTP Server, OpenVPN Server *VPN client: PPTP client, L2TP client, OpenVPN client *Mac OS Backup, Enhanced media server (AiPlayer App comp.) :Image: jpeg, Audio: mp3, wma, wav, pcm, mp4, lpcm, ogg :Video: asf, avi, divx, mpeg, mpg, ts, vob, wmv, mkv, mov *AiCloud personal cloud service, 3G/4G data sharing *Printer Server: LPR protocol support :Multifunctional printer support (Windows only) *Download Master: Download scheduling :Support bt, nzb, http, ed2k :Support encryption, DHT, PEX and magnet link :Upload and download bandwidth control *AiDisk file server: :Samba and FTP server with account management
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33043-asus-rt-ac1900p-dual-band-wireless-ac1900-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC1900P Wireless-AC1900 Router'' on '''SNB''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-rt-ac1900p-dual-band-wireless-ac1900-gigabit-router-reviewed.36368/ ''ASUS RT-AC1900P'' on '''SNB''' forums]
==See also== ===Models=== *[[ASUS RT-AC66U B1]] (V2) BCM4709A0 (@1.0 GHz) *[[ASUS RT-AC67U]] (R/W) *[[ASUS RT-AC1750]] (R/W/V2) *[[ASUS RT-AC1900]] (R/V2) BCM4709A0 (@1.0 GHz) *'''ASUS RT-AC1900P''' BCM4709C0 (@1.4 GHz)
